duck: Gub is the second release and first LP by Pigface.

(1990) This | album = 'Gub'
(1991) Next album = [[Welcome to Mexico... Asshole]]
(1991) }} {{Album ratings |rev1 = Allmusic |rev1score = |title=Gub - Pigface|publisher=Allmusic}} }} 'Gub' is the second release and first LP by Pigface. It is notable for featuring contributions from Trent Reznor of Nine Inch Nails before Nine Inch Nails achieved mainstream success. Trent Reznor re-recorded "Suck" for the Nine Inch Nails EP, Broken, released the following year.
